original_title: Bryan Kohberger described as creepy, domineering in the months before the Idaho killings, newly released documents show | CNN
article_summary: Bryan Kohberger, convicted for the 2022 Idaho college student murders, was described by peers and instructors at Washington State University as creepy, intense, and aggressive, with a tendency to stalk and intimidate, particularly women, according to newly released documents. His behavior, including silent, unblinking stares and following students, reportedly made many feel uncomfortable.</s>
